title: Fiora is unbalanced
body: I cant explain it better. She is too op, if you dont think so it's because you probably don't know how to play her well. She is overpowered, with tons of damage and that new and stupid ult that heals her! like if all the life steal wasn't enough. And then the passive, that at the beggining all the people said it was bad but i knew it was going to be a pain in the ass, and here it is. These kind of champs are not fun, like Garen; i used to play him a lot, but now its simply too easy! you dont even have to try hard.  I dont play lol in a competitive way, only for fun, and every time you play against a Fiora you know it's not going to be fun. The latest changes in Lol are bad in general (all the juggernauts stuff sucks in my opinion, a champ that has tons of life and tons of dmg, wtf?!??!) but, this champ is specially unbalanced, hope Riot will take a look to her gameplays and repair this.

Exactly the point I was trying to make as she was reworked. Even though melee AD carries like Olaf, Tryndamere, and Aatrox can deal with her early on, her true damage scaling allows her to beat anyone in the game at 25 or so minutes. Renekton is one of the only tanky champions that can deal with her because of his instant stun, but again, the longer the game goes on, the less counterable she becomes. Renekton can be fed and have more AD and AR than Fiora but she will still win the trade.  She can build a frozen heart and win trades. Other fighters can't because her true damage counters that. Even building hp doesn't work because its %max hp. Her healing is outrageous too. All she needs is a Hydra, Black Cleaver, a few defensive items, and she can do the most damage in teamfights by far while being too difficult to remove. 

%max hp true damage is the most toxic mechanic in the game next to invulnerability/untargetable. Couple this with free self-healing, high mobility, and nearly 1 second of invulnerability + hard CC in one ability basically gives her no weaknesses. 

Vayne is only acceptable with %max hp true damage because she can't deal the same kind of damage as Fiora if she builds defensively and she can reliably be CCd.

Lissandra completely destroys Fiora at any stage of the game.
2 unpredictable CC spells, ranged poke spam, double zhonya's, escape... 
Donger? Best outcome of laning against him with Fiora is 0/0/0 and not being 50 cs behind. He just laughs and zones her.
And so does Urgod, yet nobody plays him.
In fact, these three devastate any meta top laner, be it Fiora, Darius, Renekton, Garen, Rumble or GP
GP last nerfs made him too weak to be on this list imo. he is still strong... but not strong enough to be with them.

I agree. Fio is overpowered. Riposte should be changed to old riposte. It shouldn't block ALL abilities AND spells like ignite. Please. Even sivir's spellshield can't block ignite.

Her old Riposte was widely considered worthless (AD bonus upon skill points aside), hence the change in the first place. You don't take one step forward just to go one step backward, that is pointless. Do what you've probably started doing with Vlad's pool and Fizz's Playful/Trickster: Play around it. It's a defensive tool, account for it. 

Really wish people would quit trying to remove things just because they don't like them.

That's not comparable though. Fizz and Vlad don't do true damage. With the right build Fiora can duel anyone in the game successfully and wreak havoc in teamfights without the ability to lock her down.

I don't see how them not doing true damage makes the direct ability comparison invalid? 

Plus she was kinda made to be able to duel anyone in the game - it's her thing, she's the Grand Duelist, and part of the goal of the rework was to give her some teamfight presence.. It sounds like the rework was successful in its goals, they just need to tune it down.

I mean, Vlad pool and Fizz pole are complained about enough, and they dont break DoTs or are attached to hard CC and soft cc.

Her Riposte only stuns if it blocks an ability that can stun otherwise it just slows and for the record Riposte can also block ignite but by that time in a duel it would be on cooldown and she would die anyway

You don't need to preach to the converted. 
Almost everyone is aware that Fiora, Darius, and Gangplank are decimating all their top lane match ups.

Fiora is one of the few champions that can hold her own against Darius, and she is only really hard countered by Tahm Kench. 
Any sudden burst healing or shields actually negates Fiora's vital damage since it doesn't take into account the extra health gained. However, besides Tahm Kench the other champions that have these abilities such as Nasus, Renekton, Mundo, or Darius are weak in other areas to Fiora's kit.

Well, she has been having high pick rate and high ban rate for a while now. Once Riot sort out Darius and GP, they will probably take a look at Fiora's kit and tone down her numbers a but.

In the meantime, try taking ranged champion against her. Vladimir is hilariously good against Fiora if you start stacking your E before minions spawn. However, Fiora will beat him late game.
